general.translation-description: This application / website was written in German. All other languages that are available have not been translated by humans and may therefore contain translation errors.

file-formats.title: File formats
file-formats.description: Here is shown how to integrate different file formats in HTML5.

video.title: Video format
video.description: A video was integrated here. Below the video you can see the source code with which the video was integrated.
video.mp4: This is the source tag to include an MP4 that has been made.
video.ogg: This would be the source tag to include an ogg.
video.webm: This would be the source tag to include a webm.
video.tag: This is the video tag and the class 'p-justify-center' was used to center the video. The tag poster was used to include a preview image of the video. With 'autoplay =' autoplay ',' loop = 'true' the video is played automatically as soon as it has been loaded and it is repeated again and again.

images.title: Images
images.description: Here some image formats are presented and shown how images are integrated in HTML5.
images.tag: This is the tag to easily include an image.

sound.title: Music files
sound.description: Here a music file was integrated in HTML5. Below it is shown how the file was integrated.
sound.tag: This is the tag to include an MP3 file.
sound.controls: This must be set so that the user can run / stop playback and adjust the volume.
sound.src: This is the tag to specify the source, i.e. the file.
sound.notCompatible: This is displayed if a browser does not support music playback.
